text: Sonic the Hedgehog, also known as Sonic the Hedgehog SatAM, Sonic SatAM or Sonic, is a cartoon TV series starring Sonic the Hedgehog. It popularly distinguishes itself from other similarly named animated shows that also star Sonic. This series was made by DiC Entertainment, and originally ran on ABC from September 18, 1993 to June 3, 1995, and had a total of 26 episodes, at 13 episodes per season. The show starred Sonic, and the Knothole Freedom Fighters, a group of woodland animals united to fight the evil Dr. Robotnik, who has taken over the entire planet. ==References== Category:1993 television series debuts Category:1995 television series endings Category:Animated television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Sonic the Hedgehog (TV series)
